name: Rubik's
description:
This is a prototype for a game with the implementation of the Rubiks Cube fundamentals as a primary mechanic.

Rubiks is a game in which the player is located inside the cubes of a Rubik’s Cube. The player must navigate the levels by using a mechanic similar to the Rubik’s Cube. Each room will have a different type of solving requirement such as finding loot, solving a puzzle, destroying a target or killing enemies. This will be done by using a combination of level manipulation, object interaction movement and shooting mechanics.

Level Manipulation translates to the player being able to rotate a face of the cube just like a Rubik’s Cube. This will lead to some interesting gameplay as the player will most certainly lose his sense of direction as the rooms rotate.
